collectible.title: Magical Cutlass
collectible.subtitle: One of Sayaka's many discarded swords.
collectible.text: "Hey, you had best take this. Witches will probably still continue to attack you, and you need to protect yourself. I'll be fine without it, I can make as many of these as I need."

collectible.title: Soul Gem
collectible.subtitle: The source of a Magical Girl's power. Tastes like Raspberries.
collectible.text: Would you like to make a contract with Kyubey and become a magical girl? There's absolutely no possible downsides to this, because becoming a magical girl was the best thing that ever happened to me. What could possibly go wrong
